short_summary: Snow removal services, including all labor, material, equipment, supervision and transportation.
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Providng snow removal service starting FOr public service and procurement Canada
full_summary:
### [EJ196-240491 Snow Removal Services at CFSU Uplands Tender Notice](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17438741?extsite=MTc0Mzg3NDFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

#### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: WS4075118524-Doc4172846527
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4075118524
* **Publication Date**: September 13, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 25, 2023, at 2:00 p.m. EDT
* **Region of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR), Ottawa (Ontario), Canada

#### About the Project

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites tenders for the provision of Snow Removal Service at the Canadian Forces Support Unit (CFSU) Uplands, Ottawa (Ontario), Canada.

**Key Requirements**

* Provide snow removal services including labor, materials, equipment, supervision, and transportation.
* Adhere to the Statement of Work attached as Annex A.
* The successful bidder must have a representative attend a site visit scheduled for October 4, 2023, at 10:00 a.m. EDT, at 450 Croil Private, Ottawa (Ontario).

#### Contact Information

* **Contracting Authority**: PSPC
* **Contact Person**: Caroline Richard
* **Email**: caroline.richard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Phone**: Not Available

#### Trades and Services Agreement

* The successful bidder must not be prohibited from bidding on this contract under any trade and services agreement.

#### Security Clearance

* None

#### Important Dates

* September 29, 2023, at 2:00 p.m. EDT: Confirm attendance and attendants for the site visit.
* October 4, 2023, at 10:00 a.m. EDT: Conduct site visit.
* October 25, 2023, at 2:00 p.m. EDT: Tender closing date. Note: All bids submitted after 2:00 p.m. EDT will be declared non-responsive.

#### How to Submit a Bid

To submit a bid, please refer to the purchasing instructions provided at the end of this notice. The successful bidder will be notified once a decision has been made.

Please address any request for information or questions to the
